name: Commonwealth ex rel. Oveido v. Baldi, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Oveido v. Baldi

judges: Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Parker and Stearne, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Oveido v. Baldi, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Judgment and order of the Superior Court affirmed on its opinion reported in 152 Pa. Superior Court 340, 31 A. 2d 753.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Franklin F. Barr, Assistant District Attorney, with him John E. Maurer, District Attorney, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Oveido v. Baldi, Appellant.
Argued June 30, 1943.
Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Parker and Stearne, JJ.
Franklin F. Barr, Assistant District Attorney, with him John E. Maurer, District Attorney, for appellant.
Eenry D. O’Connor, for appellee.
July 13, 1943:
